## credential namespace

Temporarily, admin.credential is used as the namespace name because we cannot barrel re-export the contents from credential.ts, and we want it to match the namespacing in the re-export inside src/index.d.ts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace credential 
```
